text: Motion
Motion
Motion
It went by in the blink of an eye, didn't it?
Yeah, once we're back, it's straight to work.

That's right...
It's a bit disappointing, isn't it?

Huh, really? I thought you'd already
be thinking about the future, Natsuha.

Of course.
I intend to give my all to my work.

But... just a little bit,
I wanted to take a bus ride from that bus stop...

Ah, I see. You wanted to see the
scenery at the final destination.

...Yes.
But it's not just that.
Hmm?

If I just wanted to see the scenery at the
final destination, I could have driven there...

But I feel like if I did that, I might miss out on
the scenery along the way to the destination...

In that regard, a bus would stop multiple times
before reaching the final destination, right?

As it heads towards the final destination,
the scenery gradually changes...

I wanted to experience that kind of change
with my own senses.

Slowly but steadily progressing towards the destination,
feeling the sense of accomplishment...

...Haha,
that's so like you, Natsuha.
Hehe, do you think so?

Yeah.
Enjoying not just the destination, but the journey too.
